alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 10 at 8:06PM EST until November 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .Locally heavy rain that fell due to Tropical Storm Nicole will cause minor flooding along the Little Manatee river at Wimauma. For the Little Manatee...including Wimauma at US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river overflows its banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 10/11/1971. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Little Manatee River Wimauma at US 301 11.0 7.7 Thu 7 pm 10.0 11.0 10.1 8.3 6.8 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1115 AM EST.
